version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="generalopd"> <generalopd id="91" name="Outpatient Visit-v1"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <formname/> <date/> <serialNumber/> <motechId/> <sex/> <dateOfBirth/> <insured/> <diagnosis/> <otherdiagnosis/> <secondDiagnosis/> <othersecondarydiagnosis/> <rdtGiven/> <rdtPositive/> <actTreated/> <newCase/> <referred/> <comments/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> </generalopd> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/generalopd/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/generalopd/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/generalopd/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/generalopd/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 0" id="serialNumber" message="Negative number not allowed" nodeset="/generalopd/serialNumber" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="motechId" nodeset="/generalopd/motechId" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'motheropd-jf' or /generalopd/formname = 'childopd-jf'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="sex" nodeset="/generalopd/sex" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'generalopd-jf'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="dateOfBirth" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/generalopd/dateOfBirth" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'generalopd-jf'" required="true()" type="xsd:date" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="insured" nodeset="/generalopd/insured" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="diagnosis" nodeset="/generalopd/diagnosis" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". >= 1 and . <= 76" id="otherdiagnosis" message="Invalid diagnosis: value must be between 1 and 77" nodeset="/generalopd/otherdiagnosis" relevant="/generalopd/diagnosis = '78'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="secondDiagnosis" nodeset="/generalopd/secondDiagnosis" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". >= 1 and . <= 76" id="othersecondarydiagnosis" message="Invalid diagnosis: value must be between 1 and 77" nodeset="/generalopd/othersecondarydiagnosis" relevant="/generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '78'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="rdtGiven"
